attributes.action: Open a Full inquiry into July 7th bombings on London Underground
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are too many unanswered questions surrounding the days events. For instance the fact that there were training exercises being conducted the same day and time simulating terrorist atacks in the very same stations. This is a staggering coincidence! Why have the public never been shown cctv footage of the suspects? The list is endless please act.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
